title: im not lvl 1, im lvl 6, also major leavebuster bug
body:
please update my board profile so i can post this bug


edit: to add i even earned a keyfragment


currently won a game, was there entire game, except for victory sign, i had to use restroom then i came back, click accept victory, i saw a I agree to not leave leavebuster, and i was like..IM NOT SIGNING THAT?! i was there entire game.

[IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/eqdy8j.png[/IMG]

replies.body: We'd like to look into your specific issue and find out what's happened.  Please reach out to us with a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you individually.  We'll respond asap!
will I be safe to agree and keep playing then? and wait for a response, and hopefully they reverse it from it going on my account record?

The window that you're seeing is just an introduction to [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), and something that all players can receive.  It actually doesn't do anything else to your account or cause you to have some kind of demerit.  It's totally fine to agree and keep playing until then.  I hope that helps clear things up!

ok, thanks, and while i have your'e attention, what do I when someone is being toxic and i go top lane, and there is 2 enemy tops, but the person says to leave that lane and jungle, but I dont have smite to jungle and im only lvl 6, should I listen to the bully or mute them and play the game as normal?

At your current level, it's important to take the time you need to learn the ropes and try out whatever champion and role you can.  This will help you learn and grow until you reach 30!  Some other players may also be new and not necessarily know some things, like you can't unlock smite until level 10.  This is a great time to help each other out and shed some light, let him know why that would be a struggle or if he can help!

If it seems like another player is just being mean, you can silence him by typing /mute playername.  After a game, use the reporting tool on the post-game screen.  This will help us prioritize who we look at!

ok...so be the bigger person


and ONE MORE THING!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Cmqxe6P4Ms

if someone types a lane in lobby faster than you, does that mean they get it and you fill or should go into this bidding war?

Aw, that was such a good show!  I wanted all of the talismans.  >.>  Do your best to cooperate with your team, everyone should work to find a middle ground!  Soon you will be able to do Draft Pick which will allow you to select your preferred roles to queue for.

I was a fill main once but then I became a support main as I became better at support then all the other roles (Though at that time supports pretty much only had boots+gp10 item and wards)

But I still usually try to just fill if I am in normal blind (though I do get support most of the time)

If you are going into blind pick, I think technically priority goes to the top of list, but often not it goes to the first person to call.  I don't know when it unlocks but I prefer using normal draft pick because I'm more likely to get my preffered spot, and even if I don't get my first choice, I'll still get a place I'd rather be in.  Draft has a primary and secondary roll selection which I enjoy.  Try doing that to avoid that kind of issue.

>please update my board profile so i can post this bug

Having similar problem.
